contents:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Decree vacated and case remanded to trial court to resolve factual and legal questions concerning appellee Joy Sandra Mills’ performance or nonperformance of her parental duties in conformity with § 311(1) of the Adoption Act, Act of July 24, 1970, P.L. 620, 1 P.S. § 311(1) (Supp.1974). The trial court in making its decree should follow § 3, Rule 1 of Orphans’ Court Rules.
MANDERINO, J., filed a Dissenting Opinion.
